column4: Does anyone know how to get rid of vmware? vmware won't install saying it's already there, but i can't get rid of the other one (the current installation doesn't work)
vmware tools or server or player?
everything. THe server is what the new installation is complaining about, but i'll have to get rid of it all
just sudo rm -r /etc/vmware ..and it'll let you attempt a new install
